Wolmo Android\nCookbook The Bad Boy of the Block. You can\'t resist him, huh?
Coroutines Google login Facebook login Twitter login Instagram login Room Database MP Chart Navigation Arch. Component Data Sync Recipe with a Pokemon flavor! Tests Koin Notifications Graph QL Contact us
Google login Logout To login with Google\'s API, please click on Sign In button. If you\'re not already signed, mail and password will be asked to continue. To logout please press button at bottom. The sign in was cancelled by the user. A sign in process is currently in progress and the current one cannot continue. The sign in attempt didn\'t succeed with the current account. Unexpected error.

Facebook login To login with Facebook\'s API, please click on any Sign In button. If you\'re not already signed, user and password will be asked to continue. To logout please press button at bottom. 329539014322126 fb329539014322126 The sign in was cancelled by the user. Unexpected error Login with Facebook
Twitter login To login with Twitter\'s API, please click on any Log In button. If you\'re not already signed, user and password will be asked to continue. To look for profile picture, press "Fetch profile image" and to logout press button at the bottom. General notifications general_notifications All notifications with a normal priority will use this channel Show simple notification Show with expandable text Show with inbox style Open channel notifications Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Basic notification Recently we have discussed the emerging concept of smart farming that makes agriculture more efficient and effective with the help of high-precision algorithms. The mechanism that drives it is Machine Learning — the scientific field that gives machines the ability to learn without being strictly programmed. It has emerged together with big data technologies and high-performance computing to create new opportunities to unravel, quantify, and understand data intensive processes in agricultural operational environments. Show with a picture Show with actions Line 1: this is the very first line of an inbox styled notification Line 2: this is the very first line of an inbox styled notification

Welcome to Wolox Android Cookbook Continue
Continue
Builders
Example that starts a Coroutine that gets 5 random numbers (get this random number takes 1 second) and then shows its average. By making it sequential it will take 5 seconds, but if all the numbers are taken concurrently with async it\'ll take just 1 second.
Sequential (launch) Concurrent (launch + async)
Context - Long running task
Example that starts a Coroutine with a long running task that group 15 long running tasks. If it\'s run on the Main dispatcher, the view will be freezed and it will probably crash. If it\'s run on the Default dispatcher, you\'ll be able to use the view (move the cat to the sides!) while it\'s being performed.
Perform on main Perform on default
Scopes
Example that starts one Coroutine that logs five seconds on a scope. After two and a half seconds the view is destroyed. If it uses the he presenter\'s scope, the Coroutine stops. If the GlobalScope is used, the Coroutine continue working and keep trying to change the view, so the App crashes.\n For this you need to see the Logcat with the tag "SCOPE_EXAMPLE"!
GlobalScope Presenter\'s scope
Cascade cancellation
Example that starts three coroutines that will log the seconds, one inside each other (launches A, inside A launches B and inside B launches C). Then, after two seconds, the selected job will be cancelled.
Cancel A Cancel B Cancel C
Cooperative cancellation
Example that starts a Coroutine that waste CPU for 5 seconds and immediately after it starts it\'s cancelled. If it\'s cooperative by using `isActive` it\'ll finish immediately, if not it will wait until it\'s finish.\n For this you need to see the Logcat with the tag "COOPERATIVE_CANCEL"!
Cooperative Non cooperative
Networking Example that shows the usage of Retrofit+Coroutines. Random player matches Random teams squads (sequential) Random teams squads (async) Too many requests, please wait a minute and retry. Unexpected error. Feature not available on this mode. It takes %s ms to perform the task. >>>>>>> master
